short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace Chrome new tab with your notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable the persistence of your notes across all newly opened tabs.

Key Features:

Draggable and Resizable Notes
Stacking Notes for Kanban Boards
Customizable Note Colors
Archive Functionality
Personalized Background Styles (Dark & Light Grid, Solid Colors)
Tailored Font Styles
Keyboard Shortcut for Adding New Notes

Github : https://github.com/Abdelrahman286/New-Tab-Notes
